Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is greyish in section, the interior is spotted with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of eight lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394218) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394218)
